ygData.subject: RE: RE: Simply Charming...
ygData.msgSnippet: He s not to far from the foreman s room.  If you know where the room with the spikes coming out of the wall is, you are basically almost there.  We usually
ygData.messageBody:
He's not to far from the foreman's room. If you know where the room with
the spikes coming out of the wall is, you are basically almost there. We
usually take the long way around through the gnome castle to get to him
(including a short lava swim) so that we don't have to fight our way in.

You won't be trading one of those swords, however, since it is no drop :-(.
Works great for me, however, since my wife is a warrior :-). In our battles
now, there are constant explosions from procs from the warriors swords and
my 2 obsidian shards. Unfortunately, they are all resisted in Sol A. Can't
wait to take this party to Perma again!


> -----Original Message-----
> From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 11:02 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...
>
>
> From: John_Senior@...
>
> Ahhh, that's solved it then. Where abouts in Sol A does the Reckless
> Efreeti spawn?? I know my way around quite well, wouldn't mind
> one of those
> swords to trade with.
>
>
>
>
>
> Greg Gillan <GGillan@...> on 14/12/99 16:48:30
>
> Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
> To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
> cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...
>
>
>
>
> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> Ah, okay. Talking about 2 different efreeti's here. First one
> is in Sol A
> - The Reckless Efreeti, and drops the Obsidian Flamberge and Platinum
> Armband. Pretty easy for a level 30 group to get to.
> Second efreeti is the Efreeti Lord Djarn in Sol B. Drops the Golden
> Efreeti
> Boots and a +agi/HP ring. He's the one that's a royal pain to get to.
>
>
> Elwyn Heartstring
> Level 50 Bard of Erollisi Marr
>

> From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
